entries.title: Pope rebukes those 'ravenous' for power in annual Christmas Eve mass
entries.description: The Pope has used his Christmas Eve mass to rebuke those who are "ravenous" for wealth and power and decry war, poverty and consumerism.

entries.title: Taliban ban Afghan women from working at NGOs
entries.description: The Taliban have banned Afghan women from working at non-governmental organisations in the country.

entries.title: Protesters clash with police in Paris after three killed in shooting
entries.description: Protesters have clashed with police in Paris during demonstrations after three people were shot dead at a Kurdish cultural centre.

entries.title: Heavy snowfall causes 13 dead and more than 10,000 homes without power in Japan
entries.description: Recent snowfall across several regions in Japan has killed 13, injured more than 80 and left more than 10,000 households without power, says authorities.

entries.title: 'The Serpent' killer Charles Sobhraj arrives back in France
entries.description: Convicted killer Charles Sobhraj has arrived in France after being released from prison in Nepal.

entries.title: Fire at unregistered Russian care home kills 20
entries.description: Twenty people are dead after a fire at an unregistered care home in Siberia.
